hero.title: Software Developer
hero.description_1: I'm a software engineer who enjoys turning ideas into web apps that actually work (and look good doing it). I've spent the last few years building projects with modern stacks like React, TypeScript, and Node.js, always aiming for that sweet spot between clean code and a smooth user experience.
hero.description_2: I like making things that are useful, intuitive, and sometimes just for fun (because why not?). Whether it's a SaaS platform, a mobile app, or a little side project that got out of hand, I love bringing concepts to life and learning something new along the way. Currently exploring backend architecture, system design, and a bit of mobile development too.

whatIUse.title: What I Use
whatIUse.description: Here are the tools and technologies I work with to bring ideas to life. From frontend frameworks to backend services, these are my go-to choices for building modern applications.

react.title: React
react.description: Modern UI library for building interactive interfaces

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid styling

jest.title: Jest
jest.description: JavaScript testing framework for quality assurance

graphql.title: GraphQL
graphql.description: Query language for APIs and data fetching

nestjs.title: NestJS
nestjs.description: Progressive Node.js framework for scalable applications

mongodb.title: MongoDB
mongodb.description: NoSQL database for flexible data storage

flutter.title: Flutter
flutter.description: Google's UI toolkit for mobile apps

git.title: Git
git.description: Version control for tracking code changes

github.title: GitHub
github.description: Code hosting platform for version control

vscode.title: VS Code
vscode.description: Powerful code editor with rich extensions

project.title: Projects
project.description: Here's a curated collection of projects I've worked on, showcasing my experience with modern web and mobile technologies.

farmconnect.title: FarmConnect
farmconnect.description: A SaaS platform for managing sheep farming operations. Features include authentication, user and farm management, livestock tracking, and health monitoring. Includes a mobile RFID-scanning app.

savvy.title: Savvy
savvy.description: Web app to track Amazon product prices and get notified when prices drop or items are back in stock. Uses web scraping and CRON jobs.

bibliotech.title: BiblioTech
bibliotech.description: A web app for managing a personal reading list. Users can add books, categorize them by reading status, and update progress.

lifedrop.title: Lifedrop
lifedrop.description: A mobile app for a blood donation association in Algeria. Helps connect donors and recipients by wilaya, with multilingual support and notifications.

eplan.title: E-Plan
eplan.description: A university project to generate and display exam timetables for all fields and specialties. Includes role-based access for admins, students, and professors.

watchwave.title: WatchWave
watchwave.description: A TV show search platform using the TF-IDF algorithm to match user keywords with subtitle content, ranking shows by relevance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description1: Got an idea, a project, or just something cool to build? I'm all ears.
contact.description2: Whether you're ready to start or just exploring, feel free to reach out. Let's see what we can create together.
contact.description3: I'm always open to interesting conversations, collaboration opportunities, or just connecting with fellow developers and creators. Feel free to reach out through any of these platforms!

placeholders.name: Your full name
placeholders.message: Tell me about your project, ideas, or how I can help...

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
